mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nrafile( id, fileName, queueNo, uploadTime, uploader, restorePath, isDel, note, isQualityCustomer, statusCode, isPriority, auditor, priorityStatus ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{fileName}, (SELECT IFNULL(no, 0)+1 amount FROM ( SELECT MAX(queueNo) no FROM nrafile ) AS temp ), NOW(), #{uploader}, #{restorePath}, 0, #{note}, #{isQualityCustomer}, 0, 0, NULL, 0 )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, filename, queueNo, isQualityCustomer, uploadTime, uploader, userName, restorePath, statusCode, isPriority, note, priorityStatus FROM nrafile INNER JOIN user ON nrafile.uploader = user.userId WHERE isDel = '0' AND userState > 0 AND queueNo >= 1 AND statusCode <= 1 AND fileName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fileName} ,'%')
AND uploadTime BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(uploadtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(uploadtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY queueNo

SELECT id, filename, queueNo, isQualityCustomer, uploadTime, uploader, restorePath, statusCode, isPriority, note, priorityStatus FROM nrafile INNER JOIN user ON nrafile.uploader = user.userId WHERE userId = #{userId} AND fileName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fileName} ,'%')
AND uploadTime BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
AND DATE_FORMAT(uploadtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(uploadtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY uploadTime
